name: Saya no Uta 2- Derangement
description:
A remake of the original Saya no Uta novel from Russian team An Studio. The plot has been greatly expanded and re-envisioned. The number of endings has been increased to 12, new routes have been added, characters have been supplemented, and one new character has been added. Many bugs have been fixed along with other general improvements.[partly implemented, will be full at update 1.1.5]
Also included is a sequel story called Saya no Uta 2 which comes in one package with the remake. The story of sequel tells the story of what happened immediately following the end of original novel, showing how the world changes and what happened to the characters and to humanity.[partly implemented, will be full on update 1.2.0]
Menus and all art have been adapted to full screen resolution and full Russian audio for all characters has been promised along with an English translation. Right now the remake is still in development but a playable version is available.
